releaseNotes: Thank you to everyone for all the great support! We are working very hard to get stuff done. In this update you'll find bug fixes, small improvements and performance enhancements. If you love Decision Spin Wheel, please rate us, it would really help! :)
description:
Discover the simplicity of decision-making with Decision - Spin Wheel, the app designed to handle life's choices with a fun twist. Dive into a world where choices are made not through indecision, but through chance and a spin of a wheel.

Spin Wheel: Can't decide what to eat or what to do on a Friday night? Input your question and options into the Spin Wheel. With a quick flick, your decision is made, saving you from life's everyday indecisiveness.

Decision Card: Seek answers from a random fortune teller with a shake of your phone. Pose your question and let the Decision Triangle reveal the insights you crave, in a style reminiscent of a fortune teller.

With Decision - Spin Wheel, decision-making becomes a game of fun and chance, infusing a little excitement into your everyday choices. Download today and let the spinning decide!

Turn your decision-making into a PARTY GAME or test your luck with an exciting BINGO challenge. Add some laughter with an EMOJI twist, or enjoy the pure ENTERTAINMENT of spinning the wheel. The app offers helpful UTILITIES and LIFESTYLE features to enhance your daily routine.

Explore a realistic SIMULATION experience, try your luck with ROULETTE, or enjoy interactive CARD-based decision-making. Make food choices fun with FOOD & DRINK options or challenge your mind with a QUIZ. This app even works as a fun BOARD game alternative.

Perfect for hosting a PARTY GAME, enjoying LIFESTYLE bonding, or just trying out BINGO, this app brings endless ENTERTAINMENT. Whether you’re solving decisions with UTILITIES, exploring SIMULATION features, or laughing over EMOJI choices, Decision - Spin Wheel has something for everyone.

Play a round of ROULETTE, enjoy a CARD-inspired activity, or explore new recipes with FOOD & DRINK. Challenge your friends with a clever QUIZ or compete with others in a fun BOARD setting. Whether for serious decision-making or lighthearted fun, this app redefines the way choices are made.

Spin the wheel and enjoy an interactive PARTY GAME, test your luck with BINGO, or use the app’s practical UTILITIES to make your decisions easier. Perfect for casual LIFESTYLE fun or immersive SIMULATION experiences, this app is the ultimate ENTERTAINMENT tool for any occasion. Download now and start making decisions the fun way!


To access all features, content, and functionality you can subscribe to an annual auto-renewable subscription. This is a recurring transaction that will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and will automatically renew unless you cancel it at least 24 hours before the end of your subscription. Renewals will be charged the same cost within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase.
